short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A.R.P. Syndicate's Exploit Observer Browser Extension downloads a list of exploits for any VID detected on the website you're on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exploit Observer, A product by A.R.P. Syndicate, aggregates & interprets exploit/vulnerability data from all over the Internet. Consequently, it has evolved into The World's Largest Exploit & Vulnerability Intelligence Database and is freely accessible to all.
